TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Comparer extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IComparer, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Comparer Implements IComparer, ISerializable
public ref class Comparer sealed : System::Collections::IComparer, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 比較兩個物件是否相等，其中字串比較是區分大小寫的。

span.span: Compares two objects for equivalence, where string comparisons are case-sensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是預設的實作介面。This class is the default implementation of the interface. 類別是實作執行不區分大小寫字串比較的介面。The class is the implementation of the interface that performs case-insensitive string comparisons. 比較程序使用目前的執行緒，除非另有指定。Comparison procedures use the of the current thread unless otherwise specified. 字串比較可能會有不同的結果，根據文化特性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 如需有關特定文化特性比較的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何傳回不同的值，根據文化特性相關聯。The following code example shows how returns different values depending on the culture associated with the . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/CPP/comparercultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/CS/comparercultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/VB/comparercultures.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的比較程序來決定排序順序及大小寫規則。Comparison procedures use the specified to determine the sort order and casing rules. 字串比較可能會有不同的結果，根據文化特性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 如需有關特定文化特性比較的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何傳回不同的值，根據文化特性相關聯。The following code example shows how returns different values depending on the culture associated with the . summary.span: 執行兩個相同型別物件的區分大小寫比較，並傳回表示是否某個物件小於、等於或大於另外一方的值。

span.span: Performs a case-sensitive comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.

returns.span: 帶正負號的整數，表示 和 的相對值，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`a`實作，然後`a`。If `a` implements , then `a`. `CompareTo` (`b`) 會傳回; 否則如果`b`實作，然後已變換正負號的結果`b`。`CompareTo` (`b`) is returned; otherwise, if `b` implements , then the negated result of `b`. `CompareTo` (`a`) 會傳回。`CompareTo` (`a`) is returned. 比較`null`允許與任何類型，且不會產生例外狀況，當使用。Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using . 排序時，`null`會被視為小於任何其他物件。When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object. 字串比較可能會有不同的結果，根據文化特性。String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture. 如需有關特定文化特性比較的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02)。For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the namespace and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a59696b-d89b-45bd-946d-c75da4732d02). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何傳回不同的值，根據文化特性相關聯。The following code example shows how returns different values depending on the culture associated with the . [!code-cpp[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/CPP/comparercultures.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/CS/comparercultures.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Comparer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.Comparer/VB/comparercultures.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然方法看不到 COM 用戶端，根據預設，繼承類別將它公開和 COM 用戶端會造成非預期的行為。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients.
